nooterra-verify explain v1
target.kind=job-proof
target.input=test/fixtures/bundles/v1/jobproof/strict-fail-missing-verification-report
target.resolved=<REPO>/test/fixtures/bundles/v1/jobproof/strict-fail-missing-verification-report
target.dir=<REPO>/test/fixtures/bundles/v1/jobproof/strict-fail-missing-verification-report
mode.strict=true
mode.failOnWarnings=false
mode.format=json
hash.concurrency=
trust.governanceRoots.count=1
trust.timeAuthorities.count=
trust.pricingSigners.count=
result.ok=false
result.error=missing verify/verification_report.json
result.manifestHash=
cli.ok=false
cli.verificationOk=false
cli.errors=missing verify/verification_report.json
cli.warnings=
